overview: Casablanca! A group of young Comorians trapped in despair come together. They plan joint projects and dream of a bright future for their country. However, this common will is threatened by attempts of seduction of which Moina Hindru, the initiator of the movement, is the object. All the boys love him. Will she choose love or fight for a better tomorrow?
title: Tsendo Hisa Twamaya
